title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is given a chance to erase his criminal record.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wants to bring chaos to Gotham.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space to save humanity.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to Pandora becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Titanic
description: A romance blossoms between Jack and Rose aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the shocking truth about his world and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The story of a man with a low IQ who influences historical events.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks vengeance against the corrupt emperor.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over decades, finding solace and redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance.
